Sleep tracking is an activity that has been used for many years. But only recently, it has become more popular than ever before. There are many benefits to sleep tracking, but it is important to know that not all sleep trackers are the same and some will work better for you than others. Read on to find out how sleep tracking can help you. 

 Sleep Tracking: The Benefits 

The first benefit of sleep tracking is that it can help you manage your stress levels. Many studies have shown that stress affects our ability to get a good nights rest and when we are stressed out we often have trouble sleeping well at night which means we dont get enough REM cycles in our sleep cycle, which can lead to an increased risk of chronic disease and heart disease!
